item.title: Has Sundaram Finance Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Sundaram Finance Ltd has declared a dividend of 160%, amounting to ₹21 per share, with an ex-date of February 6, 2026. The company has demonstrated strong total returns across various periods, with a 5-year total return of 192.57%. Time: Feb 04 2026 11:30 PM IST

item.title: Has Veedol Corporation Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Veedol Corporation Ltd has declared a dividend of 700% with an ex-date of February 6, 2026. While recent returns have been volatile, the company has shown strong total returns over the longer term, particularly a 119.39% total return over the past 5 years. Time: Feb 04 2026 11:30 PM IST

item.title: Has Shriram Pistons & Rings Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Shriram Pistons & Rings Ltd has declared a dividend of 50% (₹5 per share) with an ex-date of February 6, 2026. Recent performance shows a total return of 52.63% over the past year, but there have been no returns in the longer 2 to 5-year periods. Time: Feb 04 2026 11:30 PM IST

item.title: Has SMC Global Securities Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, SMC Global Securities Ltd has declared a 30% dividend, with an ex-date of February 6, 2026. The company has shown strong total returns across various periods, with a notable 129.24% total return over the last 3 years. Time: Feb 04 2026 11:30 PM IST
